about_the_game:
Impress NPC's with your bird shooting capabilities. Make colorful drinks at the bar for a chance at access to the VIP lounge. Shoot things for massive explosions. Throw suction cup dildos at giant dartboards. These are all activities we've desired since the beginning of man, and we're happy to bring those bucket-list activities to a VR headset near you.

In Dicking Around, you can expect:
- minigames with tongue-in-cheek rewards
- challenges to improve player reputation and experience
- multiple detailed locations with a huge variety of interactable objects
- hidden objectives, secrets, and easter eggs

We're releasing in Early Access to allow a feedback focused development process. Join our Discord server and don't hesitate to give criticism.

content_descriptors.notes: General Adult Mature content, nude adult NPC's, sexual game props, guns and profanity.

name: Dicking Around

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to our game, Dicking Around. Go find some money. Throw some dildos. Shoot some guns. Blow stuff up. Have some fun. Dick around!
